RESOLVED_ENTITIES.members of the group: Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez, Jaime Gomez-Arroyo, and seven other undocumented aliens

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero: Defendant involved in a case of reckless endangerment and death enhancements while transporting unlawful aliens into the United States, with a base offense level enhanced due to the death of Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez. Argued against sentence enhancement under reckless endangerment guideline. Provided inaccurate advice on journey length to the aliens. Transported illegal aliens for money, knowing they were illegal aliens. Guided individuals through the hot South Texas desert in the dead of summer. Contended that the district court erred in enhancing his base offense level eight levels for the death of Simon-Fernandez. Represented to the group that the journey would be one day long.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alma Delia Simon-Fernandez: Undocumented female alien who died due to heat stroke during transportation by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, described as a 142-pound, normally developed and adequately nourished adult female in the autopsy report
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero, Alma Delia Si: Group of nine aliens guided by Inocencio Garcia-Guerrero for financial gain
